name: 7dfps 2020 game (untitled so far)
description:
this is an initial, incomplete version of my 7dfps game. i was not able to get this as complete as i hoped due to health reasons, but will be releasing a more complete version after the jam.

i am tired and i can't think. where is the instructions section? i will put the instructions here.

to move.  to turn. <1-9> to activate spells. only 1 is implelemented. to toggle the view between a 2up map / first person view and a dedicated first person view. the dedicated first person view currently is not centered, due to a bug.  to regenerate the labyrinth.
